content: The time input shows an AM/PM selector even though I have selected a 24h clock in my setting.

Ditto, and I find this exceedingly inconvenient because I configure everything to use 24 hour time precisely to avoid the many embarrassing mistakes that arise as a result of not doing so. In the future I suppose I will just input a timestamp by hand.
Thanks for the report! Looks like we forgot to add the "help wanted" label that will encourage folks to work on this issue (zulip/zulip#18960), which I just fixed.
